2069900.name: Maurice: In The Predator's Nest
2069900.description:
Dive into the heart-stopping world of



A first-person horror survival game where the line between prey and predator blurs in the enveloping darkness. Navigate a treacherous environment, outsmart your foes, and survive the night, whether you're fighting for your life as a survivor or embracing the thrill of the hunt as a formidable predator.



In the role of a survivor, you're plunged into darkness with nothing but your wits and essential survival tools. Each decision, from the paths you choose to the alliances you form, could mean the difference between life and death. Stealth, strategy, and teamwork are your best assets as you navigate through an environment where anything could be lurking in the shadows. Can you outwit the predator and lead your fellow survivors to safety?



Embody the terror that stalks the night as a predator, each equipped with unique abilities that make the hunt exhilarating. Your powers allow you to track, trap, and outmaneuver your prey with chilling precision. The environment is your domain, a place where you can exploit the shadows to your advantage. Will you dominate the night and prove yourself as the ultimate predator?
2069900.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
